mdRecord.dcterms:title: Jacob Slusher Cemetery
mdRecord.dcterms:description:
Located in an open pasture on top of a hill overlooking the West Fork of Little River; 500 yards SE from the home of the Huff family (151 Slusher Grant Ln NW). Access is thru the Huffs' front yard, so please notify the Huffs if you intend to visit. It is fenced and very well maintained. It is visible using Google earth.
In Court House District N36' 54.021' W80' 22.096'
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lists
Cemeteries
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
